0: ffmpeg -loglevel verbose -hwaccel qsv -c:v h264_qsv -i - -c:v copy -c:a copy -rtsp_transport tcp -f rtsp rtsp://0.0.0.0:8554/{cam_name}

- job_name: node-exporter
  honor_labels: true
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  metrics_path: /metrics
  scheme: http
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "10.5.0.10:9100"
